sentences.en: A bad padlock invite a picklock.
A bad padlock invites a picklock.

sentences.cn: 坏锁惹来撬锁人.(予人可趁之机. )

sentences.en: A padlock icon is displayed when visiting secure sites.
sentences.cn: 当访问安全站点时会显示锁的图标.

sentences.en: Eddie parked his bicycle against a lamppost and padlocked it.
sentences.cn: 艾迪把他的自行车停靠在一根路灯柱上，然后用挂锁锁上了。

sentences.en: He hacked the padlock off the door.
sentences.cn: 他把门上的挂锁砸掉了.

sentences.en: He undid the padlock and eased back the lid.
sentences.cn: 他打开挂锁，轻轻推开箱盖。

sentences.en: I saw him padlock the rickety door behind us.
sentences.cn: 我见他在我们背后把摇摇晃晃的门锁上了.

sentences.en: Officials say the back door had been padlock ed.
sentences.cn: 官方称后门已经被关闭.

sentences.en: The metal ladder has the diaphragm with padlock device and alarm nameplate.
sentences.cn: 金属梯设置带挂锁设施和警告铭牌的隔板.

sentences.en: The old padlock was red with rust.
There was a padlock and chain upon the gate.
sentences.cn: 铁门上挂着把大锁,还系了根铁链.

sentences.en: They had put a padlock on the door of his flat.
sentences.cn: 他们已经在他的公寓门上上了把挂锁。

sentences.en: This is a manufacturer of padlock.
sentences.cn: 这是一家生产防盗锁地厂家.

sentences.en: This padlock is held in fee simple.
sentences.cn: 继承者对这片土地享有全权,可任意处置.
结婚是一种锁;婚姻即锁链.

sentences.en: Whose hare - brained idea was it to padlock the fire exits?
sentences.cn: 安全门上锁是谁的馊主意?

trans.tran_en: a lock that you can put on a gate, door, bicycle etc
If you padlock something, you lock it or fasten it to something else using a padlock
